DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine acupuncture effective prevent prolonged postoperative paralysis gastrointestinal tract among patient undergo colostomy/ileostomy closure .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Prevent Postoperative Bowel Paralysis ( Paralytic Ileus )
DOC.criteria: Previous surgical cancer treatment ileostomy/colostomy , schedule closure Hospital admission must day surgery Incapacitating disease Concurrent herbal laxative use Use Heparin Coumadin Upper low extremity deformity Chronic constipation prior cancer diagnosis History cerebrovascular accident spinal cord injury Chronic pain treat form major opioid weak opioids ( =/ > 30mg/24 hour ) Pacemaker metal implant Concurrent alternative medicine/herbal use
